ChunkText: 1. last semester duration: last semester before graduation only limitations: up to 2 semesters, if the student later discovers that their last semester will not actually be their last requires an I-20 extension enrollment requirements: only required to enroll in credits remaining to graduate at least 1 credit requirements to be approved: your I-20 end date must show that this is your last semester.
ContextBefore: in some cases, an rcl can be approved during the semester if you need to drop the class. please note these rules are very strict and the exceptions are not very accommodating please plan appropriately!
ContextAfter: special approval is not required from isss this rcl is automatic if your I-20 shows it is your last semester.
